edu.cmu.ri.rcommerce.filter
Interface PedestrianLocalization

All Superinterfaces:
AccelerometerListener, GyroListener, MagnetometerListener
All Known Implementing Classes:
PedestrianLocalization_Gyro, PedestrianLocalization_StandardDeviation, PedestrianLocalization_StepDetection
public interface PedestrianLocalization
extends AccelerometerListener, MagnetometerListener, GyroListener

Interface for methods of localizing pedestrians. Currently assumes the localization method uses some combination of accelerometer, magnetometer, and gyroscope.

Author:
Nisarg
